> 
> I'm guessing all the smoke and stuff is from Gimp?

Yessir. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Hey man, any chance you could do one of my Eagle-1 SSTO?
> craft file: [**DOWNLOAD**](http://www./download/zg4vq32zo14vmb6/Eagle-1+SSTO.craft)
> 
> 
> 
> MJ

Yep, give me a little while to finish with Zaminovar's stuff. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Yessir. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

You should make a tutorial on how one of these days.

These are extremly nice! Do you think you could do my Vulture Nova?

Forum thread: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97300-Kerbin-Orbital-Defence-Industries-BDarmory-required?p=1553894&viewfull=1#post1553894](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97300-Kerbin-Orbital-Defence-Industries-BDarmory-required?p=1553894&viewfull=1#post1553894)

Download: [www./download/6grq7cngjog4r6y/Vulture_Nova_STOCK.craft](www./download/6grq7cngjog4r6y/Vulture_Nova_STOCK.craft)

> 
> Yessir. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> Yep, give me a little while to finish with Zaminovar's stuff. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Sure mate, no rush. Thank you!

The backlog is getting real! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

The Vulture Nova looks nice; it'll be a quick render, too.
How do you move the light panels and bottom? Slfor some reason it's not selecting theM

![wNhtldq.png](http://i.imgur.com/wNhtldq.png)

Zaminovar, the Maelstrom Alpha and Chaos cruiser are on hold, I can't get them to import properly. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Next is the Eagle-1.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> How do you move the light panels and bottom? Slfor some reason it's not selecting theM

I just move everything else... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

For me, coud you do 250 samples per pixel?

This is the craft:

Stock [Aeris 2A](http://kerbalx.com/DMSP/Aeris%202A)

This will be greatly appreciated and +reped.

Thanks, DMSP!

> 
> next is the eagle-1.

zomg!! If you could make it look like its sitting on the tarmac that would be awesome.

> 
> zomg!! If you could make it look like its sitting on the tarmac that would be awesome.

Whoops. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I came too late.

Render request added to queue. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

But for now, have this one.

![Yii1EKO.png](http://i.imgur.com/Yii1EKO.png)

How are you doing that lens flare?

> 
> How are you doing that lens flare?

It's called a "Gradient Flare". There are around seven default ones, and you can tweak them to your liking. (Using GIMP.)

> 
> It's called a "Gradient Flare". There are around seven default ones, and you can tweak them to your liking. (Using GIMP.)

Cool.

![GkaKXhn.png](http://i.imgur.com/GkaKXhn.png)

Next in line is DSMP's Aeris 2A.

> Next in line is DSMP's Aeris 2A.

Yay! I just wanted something cool and simple.

I am almost done with my \_\_\_\_\_ super mission (Secrets) and will post it here!

Woah! That looks awesome! Have some rep, and thank you so much! 

BTW, are you using an older KSP installation? The reaction wheels on the wings shouldn't be so big...

> 
> Woah! That looks awesome! Have some rep, and thank you so much! 
> BTW, are you using an older KSP installation? The reaction wheels on the wings shouldn't be so big...

DSMP, you're done!
